title: Enhancing Open Source Security with Blockchain Technology
description: Discover how blockchain technology enhances security in open-source projects by offering transparency, data integrity, and cryptographic security. Learn about its application in code integrity, supply chain security, and collaborative environments, alongside addressing challenges and future prospects.
keywords: Blockchain technology, open-source security, transparency, data integrity, cryptographic security, smart contracts, immutable records, decentralized package management, code integrity, supply chain security, collaboration, DAOs
